descriptions.id:
- Penambahan fitur bahasa aplikasi
- Perbarui Core App
- Perbarui Settings App
- Ubah parameter alarm indikator (ubah menjadi indikator kelembapan)
- Include notification program (for windows)
descriptions.en:
- Addition of app language features
- Update Core App
- Update Settings App
- Change the alarm parameter of the indicator (change to humidity indicator)
- Include notification program (for windows)
